May 2, 1976 D Holme Valley Brass Band Contest (Section B)
Holme Valley Brass Band Contest (Section B) 20 Hymn & Own Choice Test Piece Contest Holme Valley Brass Band Contest holme-valley-brass-band-contest-section-b
March, Hymn and Own Choice Test Piece Contest
Civic Hall, Holmfirth Best basses - Skelmanthorpe. Best cornet - F.Shepley (Boarshurst) Hymn tune - Boarshurst. March contest - Hade Edge (Section A) 7 bands competed.
April 6, 2012, 8:41 a.m. Sept. 14, 2017, 11:04 a.m.
1 Boarshurst Silver Band Bryan Garside
2 Holme Silver (Disposables UK Group) Band David Hirst
3 Skelmanthorpe Band A. Pollard
4 Marsden Silver Prize Band Herbert H. Howarth
5 Honley Silver Band T. Webster
